dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notification]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 08, 2005 10:45 AM
To: legal@opticalxtreme.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notification]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notification
Date: Mon, 6 Jun 2005 20:08:44 -0700
From: Legal Dept [O| X] <legal@opticalxtreme.com>
Organization: O|X Optical Xtreme Corp
To: <info@dvd-angel.com>
CC: wlevine@globat.com, abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sir or Madam,

Optical Xtreme Corp ("OX") swears under penalty of perjury that Clover
Publisher Ltd ("Clover") has authorized OX to act as its agent for copyright
infringement notification. OX's search of the protocol listed below has
detected infringements of Clover's copyright interests on your IP addresses
as detailed in the attached report.

OX has reasonable good faith belief that use for the material in the manner
complained of in the attached report is not authorized by Clover, its
agents, or the law. The information provided herein is accurate to the best
of our knowledge. Therefore, this letter is an official notification under
provisions of section 512(c) of the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act to
effect removal of the detected infringement listed in the attached report.
The Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic Works, the
Universal Copyright Convention, as well as bilateral treaties with other
countries allow for protection of client's copyrighted work even beyond U.S.
borders. The attached documentation specifies the exact location of the
infringement.

We hereby request that you immediately remove or block access to the
infringing material, as specified in the copyright laws, and insure the user
refrains from using or sharing with others Clover's materials in the future.

Please send us a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to
resolve this matter.

Matt Kobayashi
Optical Xtreme Corp
2478 Peck Road
Industry, CA 90601

V: 562-908-1077
F: 562-908-1082
legal@opticalxtreme.com


-
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------

Infringers IP Address: 67.19.91.2, 203.22.204.73 Infringers URL:
http://www.dvd-angel.com, http://www.1erodvd.com/index2.html
